## ReadPublicKey_1

```python
from libnum import *
from Crypto.PublicKey import RSA
from base64 import b64decode
pub = RSA.importKey(open('key.pub','r').read())
flag = s2n(b64decode(open('flagb64.txt','r').read()))
p = 965445304326998194798282228842484732438457170595999523426901
q = pub.n // p
n2s(pow(flag,invmod(pub.e,(p-1)*(q-1)),pub.n))
```
`Flag : ALEXCTF{SMALL_PRIMES_ARE_BAD}`

## ReadPublicKey_2

```python
from libnum import *
from Crypto.PublicKey import RSA
pem = ['Part1/PublicKey1.pem','Part2/PublicKey2.pem','Part3/PublicKey3.pem']
cip = ['Part1/ciphertext1','Part2/ciphertext2','Part3/ciphertext3']
p = [15907423136267341555433,138769550589434889129983,32133336765473179918313]
for i in range(3):
    pub = RSA.importKey(open(pem[i],'r').read())
    cipher = s2n(open(cip[i],'rb').read())
    q = pub.n // p[i]
    print(n2s(pow(cipher,invmod(pub.e,(p[i]-1)*(q-1)),pub.n)))
```
`Flag : EC{S4V3YUBITS_FL46}`

## ReadPublicKey_3

```python
from libnum import *
from Crypto.PublicKey import RSA
from base64 import b64decode
pub = RSA.importKey(open('PublicKey.pem','r').read())
flag = s2n(open('ciphertext','rb').read())
p = 
q = pub.n // p
n2s(pow(flag,invmod(pub.e,(p-1)*(q-1)),pub.n))
```
`Flag : YUBITSEC{G00D_J0B_BRO_Y0U_MUST_KN0W_H0W_D03S_1T_W0RKS}`
